patchNotes.title: Talent rework
patchNotes.developerCommentary: Right now Qhira is one melee assassin that has a kit focused only on fighting without any clear wave and even with that she's also not the strongest fighter. My objective here will be to bring Qhira fight potential to the maximum while i give her little options for PvE as i want her to be an PvP focused character and for that i will give her tools to maximize the Spiderman potential

texts.text: Basic attack damage reduced to 80 from 100
Basic attacks against bleeding targets increase the damage by 20% per bleed stack

general.developerCommentary: I want to further compromisse Qhira with the Bleeding synergy

texts.text: Qhira gains an extra charge of <modified, abilities, trait, 0> every 3 takedowns up to 5 times
<modified, abilities, trait, 0> recharges 10% faster for every active <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> stack

general.developerCommentary: This is the beginning of spiderQhira. I am going for that route because i always thought that the <modified, abilities, trait, 0> was an underdeveloped part of Qhira kits, one of her skills that could increase her skill ceiling to the roof but it's missused

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 1>

texts.text: Additional quest completion method: Activate <modified, abilities, basic, 1> while 3 enemy heros are at full stack.

changes.developerCommentary: Following Alarak and Maiev quest completion method i want to make it easier to complete quests when you do it right fast

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 2>

texts.text: Doesn't increase basic attack damage anymore
Additional functionality: Hitting enemies with <modified, abilities, trait, 0> increase Qhira movespeed by 15% for 2 seconds

changes.developerCommentary: With the changes i made with the extra attack damage by hitting bleed targets giving her more basic attack damage would be overkill

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 1>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Increase Qhira rotating speed on <modified, abilities, basic, 2> by 200%

changes.developerCommentary: Esnaring sweep wasn't one of the most attractive talents compared to their counterparts but increasing rotating speed could lead to better interaction with other sweep talents

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 2>

texts.text: Now <modified, abilities, trait, 0> also give armor stacks

changes.developerCommentary: Changing it to better suit the SpiderQhira lore.

changes.name: New:Hooked

texts.text: <modified, abilities, trait, 0> now target non-heroic units dealing extra 2000% damage, <modified, abilities, trait, 0> refunds a charge if it kills a non-heroic target

changes.developerCommentary: The objective here is to give Qhira new ways to chase whilst also giving her a little PvE damage, take in mind that the damage is supposed to be around the life of a warrior minion + 1 auto but i don't know if i put the correct value

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 1>

texts.text: If <modified, abilities, basic, 1> damages an enemy Hero below 50% Health, it heals for an additional 150 Health and 75 more health for other heroes under 50% Health.

changes.developerCommentary: I wish to make this talent a little worse on 1x1 and better on teamfights.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 2>

texts.text: Removed passive

Additional functionality: Chaging prey(Active) : While under <modified, abilities, basic, 2> effect activate to re-cast <modified, abilities, basic, 2> in the target direction, if Qhira hits someone she changes the <modified, abilities, basic, 2> target

changes.developerCommentary: The <vanilla, talents, 7, 2> always bugged me..why would something related to the sweep have a healing talent on basic attack whilst it doesn't benefit it on anything or synergize and for that i didn't feel like it belonged there. Replacing it we have something that would benefit the SpiderQhira possibilities and synergizing with the primary talent concept

changes.name: <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1>

texts.text: Increased range by 5

changes.developerCommentary: Qhira <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1> always felt too short, increasing it by a little less than half it's range would just make it 10/10. The amount of time i see other people and myself had the little range difference to hit the target is not normal and shouldn't be taught as only 'skill issue'

changes.name: <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 0>

texts.text: You can now use <modified, abilities, trait, 0> while  channeling <modified, abilities, heroic, 0>

changes.developerCommentary: This talent is hardly used right

texts.text: Changed functionality: For each second Qhira swings around a target she receives 12 spell armor that will expire 5 seconds after re-activates or stop swinging. Hitting enemy heroes with <modified, abilities, trait, 0> decreases <modified, abilities, basic, 2> cooldown by 3 seconds

changes.name: Silent Killer

texts.text: Decrease <modified, abilities, heroic, 0> are by 1 meter

changes.developerCommentary: With the changes on the base <modified, abilities, heroic, 0> we need to nerf it because it's truly eazier to perform the wombo wipes we've seen Qhira mains making, this is one of the level 20 talents that could solo win a fight and the extra area would easily make it wipe entire teams without effort. It's the Leoric entomb upgrade treatment

changes.name: Unleashed Potential

texts.text: Changed functionality: Casting <modified, abilities, heroic, 1> unleashes two additional beams that curve outward, each dealing 50% damage. The beams converge towards the end of the original <modified, abilities, heroic, 1>, creating an area of effect that deals 250% of the ultimate damage.

changes.developerCommentary: I tried lots of times to think..What is making the level 20 talent of <modified, abilities, heroic, 1> a little odd? First it starts by being a finishing ultimate that RESETS COOLDOWN if you are finishing someone it make less likely that you will use that resets and the ultimate doesn't give any give of mobility for you to use these resets better..sure you have the <modified, abilities, trait, 0> but on a teamfight you have high chances to have already used the <modified, abilities, trait, 0> when you reset atleast on my vision it's counterintuitive except for the ultimate reset on kill. On that instance i want to bring something that further increase the concept of 'unsleashed potential' and finisher move to make it more original and unique that is bringing more the finishing part.

changes.name: New: Mortal Wounds

texts.text: Activating <modified, abilities, basic, 1> makes targets with 5 bleed stacks do receive 100% more bleed damage for 3 seconds if they move
Reference: Dota 2 Bloodseeker RUPTURE

changes.developerCommentary: I would say that would be a test..i find it fun but also too disruptive

changes.name: No Sanctuary

texts.text: Additional functionality: <modified, abilities, trait, 0> now always pulls Qhira
Killing an enemy hero resets <modified, abilities, trait, 0> charges

changes.developerCommentary: No Sanctuary has the 'predator' concept and with that in mind i want to suit it with the <modified, abilities, trait, 0> changes and make Qhira the ultimate predator (That sounds criminal)

changes.name: Utility belt

texts.text: Changed functionality: Come over here(Active): While swinging on <modified, abilities, basic, 2> Qhira pulls the affected target to her
<modified, abilities, trait, 0> now stuns targets it hit for 0.25 seconds and hitting terrain refunds half of the <modified, abilities, trait, 0> cooldown.

changes.developerCommentary: With the changes i made for <modified, abilities, trait, 0> utility belt the way it is doesn't feel valid anymore so i'm really changing it to be closer of an utility belt. Also the pull active is to better suit <modified, talents, 16, 1> and <modified, talents, 16, 2> playstyles all you don't want always to kick lots of people like with <modified, talents, 16, 0>
